artist: Author: Eugene Carrington; Publisher: Eugene Carrington , New York
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, xerographic text printed on wove paper covers; 20 pp.
inscription: Inside of front cover, black ink en: To Fly thanks / so much for this / great interview. Hope / you like my latest. / Love, Eugene
title: The Selected Poems of Eugene Carrington
